name: Daily Voice Reminder & YT Stats
description: A Chrome extension for to-dos, custom reminders with voice, YouTube channel stats, and Discord logging.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.googleapis.com/ https://discord.com/; object-src 'self';
